rooms.description: Spacious entrance hall with wheelchair accessible entry, compliant with local building norms and Vastu principles.
Open-plan living area adjacent to the central courtyard for natural light and ventilation, designed with accessibility in mind.
Cozy dining space adjoining the living room and accessible through an open door for easy movement.
Modern kitchen with wheelchair accessible layout, designed to optimize workflow and energy flow according to Vastu principles.
Quiet library space overlooking the central courtyard, ensuring privacy and conducive for reading while adhering to local norms.
Well-equipped private gym with accessible design elements, including low-impact flooring and ample space for wheelchair maneuverability.
Accessible guest bedroom with essential amenities, designed to meet both comfort and Vastu guidelines.
